alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Marfa Plateau; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 16 at 2:18PM CST until February 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and west Texas. * WHEN...From 3 PM CST /2 PM MST/ this afternoon to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause power disruptions, hazards to trailers and high profile vehicles and blowing dust that can reduce visibility suddenly to near zero. Motorists should exercise extreme caution while driving in the high wind warning area. Be alert to sudden gusts of wind that may cause you to lose control of your vehicle.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
